original_text: “Then they shall take some of the blood and put it on the two doorposts and the lintel of the houses in which they eat it.
korean_text: 그 피를 양을 먹을 집 좌우 문설주와 인방에 바르고

sentences.original_text: “Then they shall take some of the blood
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들은 그 피 얼마를 가져다가

sentences.original_text: and put it on the two doorposts and the lintel
of the houses in which they eat it.
